titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony by a Senate investigator in the case of United States v. Antonio Fernandez, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 11/13/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the testimony of David Faulkner, a former Senate employee and current consultant, to testify in the case of United States v. Antonio Fernandez, et al., concerning a documented interview.
